categories: Category:Office of Peace and Security officers

nodes.text: Escra Fey'lya was a female Bothan, who was a member of the Office of Peace and Security during the time of the Clone Wars.

Fey'lya was an Inspector in the Organized Crime Division of the OPS. When the Rodian pilot Teeloo was assassinated by Kills, an assassin working for the Hutt crime lord Riboga, Fey'lya was sent to investigate.
Escra shares her surname with another Bothan character, Borsk Fey'lya.
